id.comment: Set 1 - Relation tests for Selecting Tuple (Algorithmic Tests). Relation, 0 clause Select stmt/read

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; Select <s, r>

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select print/call

query.querystr: print pn; call cl; Select <pn, cl>

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select while/if

query.querystr: while w; if ifs; Select <w, ifs>

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select assign/variable

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select <a, v>
query.stuans: 11 i,11 inc,11 input,11 j,11 k,11 num,11 target,11 x,11 y,12 i,12 inc,12 input,12 j,12 k,12 num,12 target,12 x,12 y,21 i,21 inc,21 input,21 j,21 k,21 num,21 target,21 x,21 y,22 i,22 inc,22 input,22 j,22 k,22 num,22 target,22 x,22 y,26 i,26 inc,26 input,26 j,26 k,26 num,26 target,26 x,26 y,4 i,4 inc,4 input,4 j,4 k,4 num,4 target,4 x,4 y,5 i,5 inc,5 input,5 j,5 k,5 num,5 target,5 x,5 y
query.correct: 4 x,4 y,4 i,4 j,4 inc,4 target,4 k,4 input,4 num,5 x,5 y,5 i,5 j,5 inc,5 target,5 k,5 input,5 num,11 x,11 y,11 i,11 j,11 inc,11 target,11 k,11 input,11 num,12 x,12 y,12 i,12 j,12 inc,12 target,12 k,12 input,12 num,21 x,21 y,21 i,21 j,21 inc,21 target,21 k,21 input,21 num,22 x,22 y,22 i,22 j,22 inc,22 target,22 k,22 input,22 num,26 x,26 y,26 i,26 j,26 inc,26 target,26 k,26 input,26 num

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select constant/prog_line

query.querystr: constant c; prog_line n; Select <c, n>

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select procedure/synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr; call cl; Select <pr, cl>

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select 2 elem of the same synonym 1

query.querystr: read r; Select <r, r>

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select 2 elem of the same synonym 2

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; Select <pr, pr1>
query.stuans: A A,A B,A C,A D,B A,B B,B C,B D,C A,C B,C C,C D,D A,D B,D C,D D
query.correct: A A,A B,A C,A D,B A,B B,B C,B D,C A,C B,C C,C D,D A,D B,D C,D D

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select 2 elem of different synonym 1

query.querystr: variable v; constant c; Select <v, c>

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select 2 elem of different synonym 2

query.querystr: procedure pr; variable v; Select <pr, v>
query.stuans: A i,A inc,A input,A j,A k,A num,A target,A x,A y,B i,B inc,B input,B j,B k,B num,B target,B x,B y,C i,C inc,C input,C j,C k,C num,C target,C x,C y,D i,D inc,D input,D j,D k,D num,D target,D x,D y
query.correct: A x,A y,A i,A j,A inc,A target,A k,A input,A num,B x,B y,B i,B j,B inc,B target,B k,B input,B num,C x,C y,C i,C j,C inc,C target,C k,C input,C num,D x,D y,D i,D j,D inc,D target,D k,D input,D num

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select at least 3 elem of different synonym 1

query.querystr: read r; print pn; while w; Select <r, pn, w>

id.comment: Relation, 0 clause Select at least 3 elem of different synonym 2

query.querystr: call cl; if ifs; constant c; procedure pr; Select <cl, ifs, c, pr>

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Follows

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; Select <s, r> such that Follows(s, r)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Follows*

query.querystr: print pn; if ifs; Select <ifs, pn> such that Follows*(ifs, pn)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Parent

query.querystr: while w; assign a; Select <w, a> such that Parent(w, a)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Parent*

query.querystr: if ifs; call cl; Select <cl, ifs> such that Parent*(ifs, cl)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause UsesS

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select <a, v> such that Uses(a, v)
query.stuans: 11 inc,12 i,12 inc,21 k,22 i,22 k,26 i,26 inc,26 input,26 num,26 target,26 x,26 y,4 x,5 y
query.correct: 4 x,5 y,11 inc,12 inc,12 i,21 k,22 i,22 k,26 x,26 y,26 inc,26 i,26 num,26 input,26 target

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause UsesP

query.querystr: procedure pr; variable v; Select <pr, v> such that Uses(pr, v)
query.stuans: A x,A y,B i,B inc,B input,B j,B k,B num,B target,B x,B y,C i,C k,D i,D inc,D input,D num,D target,D x,D y
query.correct: A x,A y,B x,B y,B i,B j,B inc,B target,B k,B input,B num,C i,C k,D x,D y,D i,D inc,D target,D input,D num

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause ModifiesS

query.querystr: read r; variable v; Select <r, v> such that Modifies(r, v)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause ModifiesP

query.querystr: procedure pr; variable v; Select <pr, v> such that Modifies(pr, v)
query.stuans: A x,A y,B i,B inc,B input,B k,B num,B target,B x,B y,C i,C k,D input,D num,D x,D y
query.correct: A x,A y,B i,B inc,B target,B k,B input,B num,B x,B y,C i,C k,D x,D y,D input,D num

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Calls

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; Select <pr, pr1> such that Calls(pr, pr1)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Calls*

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; Select <pr, pr1> such that Calls*(pr, pr1)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Next

query.querystr: call cl; print pn; Select <cl, pn> such that Next(cl, pn)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select <a, v> pattern a(v, _"i"_)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Pattern if

query.querystr: if ifs; variable v; Select <ifs, v> pattern ifs(v, _, _)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause Pattern while

query.querystr: while w; variable v; Select <w, v> pattern w(v, _)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause all Select synonym independent 1

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; constant c; call cl; Select <c, cl> such that Calls(pr, pr1)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause all Select synonym independent 2

query.querystr: assign a; if ifs; Select <ifs, ifs> pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause one Select synonym related 1

query.querystr: procedure pr; constant c; Select <pr, c> such that Uses(pr, "k")

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause one Select synonym related 2

query.querystr: while w; read r; Select <w, r> pattern w("j", _)

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause all Select synonym dependent 1

query.querystr: print pn; variable v; Select <pn, v> such that Uses(pn, v)
query.stuans: 17 i,18 i,20 target,23 k,27 num,6 x,7 y
query.correct: 6 x,7 y,17 i,18 i,20 target,23 k,27 num

id.comment: Relation, 1 clause all Select synonym dependent 2

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select <a, v> pattern a(v, "x")

id.comment: Relation, 2 clause all Select synonym independent 1

query.querystr: stmt s; prog_line n; read r; if ifs; constant c; Select <c, c> such that Next(s, n) and Follows(r, ifs)

id.comment: Relation, 2 clause all Select synonym independent 2

query.querystr: assign a, a1, a2; if ifs; Select <ifs, a2> pattern a(_, _) and a1(_, _"target"_)

id.comment: Relation, 2 clause one Select synonym related 1

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; while w; Select <a, w> pattern a("i", _) such that Uses(a, "i")

id.comment: Relation, 2 clause one Select synonym related 2

query.querystr: if ifs, ifs1; call cl; assign a; variable v; Select <ifs, ifs1> such that Parent(ifs, cl) pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Relation, 2 clause all Select synonym dependent 1

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; Select <pr, pr1> such that Calls(pr, pr1) and Uses(pr, "j")

id.comment: Relation, 2 clause all Select synonym dependent 2

query.querystr: while w; read r; Select <w, r> pattern w("i", _) such that Parent(w, r)

id.comment: Relation, At least 3 clause all Select synonym independent 1

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; while w, w1; constant c; Select <w1, c> such that Follows*(8, 20) pattern a(v, "inc + 1") such that Next(a, w)

id.comment: Relation, At least 3 clause all Select synonym independent 2

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; constant c; Select <pr1, c, c> such that Uses(12, "i") and Modifies(12, "i") and Uses(pr, "i")

id.comment: Relation, At least 3 clause some Select synonym related 1

query.querystr: if ifs; while w; variable v; procedure pr; Select <ifs, pr> pattern ifs("target", _, _) and w("target", _) such that Modifies(ifs, v)

id.comment: Relation, At least 3 clause some Select synonym related 2

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; assign a; while w; if ifs; Select <a, ifs, a> such that Calls*(pr, pr1) and Next(a, 8) pattern a("i", _) and w("i", _) such that Uses(a, "inc")

id.comment: Relation, At least 3 clause all Select synonym dependent 1

query.querystr: procedure pr; variable v; while w; Select <pr, v> such that Calls(_, pr) and Modifies(pr, v) and Uses(pr, v) pattern w(v, _)

id.comment: Relation, At least 3 clause all Select synonym dependent 2

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; print pn; while w; variable v; Select <v, s, pn> such that Next(s, pn) pattern a(v, _"inc"_) such that Parent(14, s) pattern w(v, _)
